title: How to Use Extended Desktop View in Windows XP

steps.headline: Connect the external monitor to the second VGA port.
Right click on your desktop and select properties.
steps.description: Choose the settings tab. Two square boxes representing your monitors are shown. Your primary monitor is labeled 1 and the Secondary or external monitor is 2. Monitor One is highlighted by default.

steps.headline: Click on the external monitor 2 to highlight it, then check the box beside “Extend my windows desktop onto this monitor" and click OK.
Note that everything has worked properly.
steps.description: Your primary monitor should still be the same and your external monitor should just have your desktop without icons, and without the taskbar.
